Key Match Events: Rinku Singh hit a quick-fire 16 in India's 6-wicket win over Afghanistan in the T20I series opener in Mohali.
Rinku Singh has hit 278 runs in 13 T20Is, averaging 69.50 with a strike rate of 180.
Post-Match Reflections: Rinku Singh recalled a chat with MS Dhoni from IPL 2023, saying that the World Cup-winning former captain gave him advice on how to stay composed during high-pressure chases.
Rinku Singh expressed that staying calm and focusing on the present, as advised by MS Dhoni, has been working for him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rinku Singh has put himself in the mix for the T20 World Cup 2024 campaign in June, coming up with consistent performances since he made his debut last year.
Rinku Singh mentioned that he enjoyed batting in the cold during the match in Mohali.
